website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for anyone who wants a stable and secure TV mount that effortlessly blends into its surroundings.
pros: Garners praise for its super-slim design and long arm extension which holds steady even under maximum loads
cons: The directions only have pictures, not words, making installation confusing and frustrating for many people

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected. Make sure your TV ports aren't blocked by the mount.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. You need to make sure your power cord will fit. The TV I had mounted with this (by a professional) is a Samsung 40" (model UN40H5003AFXZA). The power cord was barely able to fit since it's an L shape and there was just enough room.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 51 inch Samsung Plasma in my old apartment around 4-5 years ago. Now its on the wall in my bedroom as is the Plasma. Put a OLED in the living room . Still functions as intended after being installed then removed and reinstalled in the new place.
customer_reviews.author: dpro

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't get any easier than this
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about this mount. They could not make it any easier to hang a TV on the wall. Make sure you check that your TV is "VESA mountable"!! Aside from the horizontal arms, the mount allows you adjust the tv clockwise/counter-clockwise and allows you to pitch it forward for higher mounting. It also includes some cable management brackets (thought they are on the cheap side). One slight oddity was that the two horizontal arm segments are different lengths. So when the arms are both folded in completely, the tv bracket is NOT centered on the wall-mounting bracket. That bothered me for some reason, but the other points FAR outweighed any irritation there.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great stand away distance. It can achieve a good angle of about 45 degrees on my 55" and almost a complete right angle on my 40". Easy to install, 2 bolts. nice wire routing although i wish the channels were a bit larger. Looks nice when exposed. It sits pretty flat to the wall when completely retracted. Its sturdy considering its size. For the record I have 2 of the these. One hooked up to a 55" vizio E550I-b2 (55") and one to a Older, heavier, Sony Kdx40 (40"). I couldn't be happier with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Geloso

customer_reviews.title: Solid mount for large-screen TVs - very nice
customer_reviews.text: The price was outstandingly right and so the value is WAY up there - the mount went up rapidly and our new Vizio was well under the max weight capability. We can (and do) turn (yaw) the TV left or right regularly depending on number of people viewing. I used the mount's "roll" adjustment to slightly tilt it (counterclockwise) to correct for a small inaccuracy in my wall drilling - fantastic. We haven't used the slight "pitch" adjustment but could, for example, if we had floor-sitters playing video games. After installing the first one for the new TV, I bought a second to mount another that had been using a stand.
customer_reviews.author: justanothertechie

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic wall mount
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic wall mount, especially for the price. It can be moved side to side or out away from the wall. It also holds a lot of weight, we use it for a 55 inch LED and it works great. Other wall mounts with these features, and this weight and size capacity can be seen for double the price depending on the brand. And they do nothing more but bear a brand name. This is a very durable high quality item for a bargain price. It is also easy to install. You can't go wrong here. I would definitely buy from Invision again should we need something of this nature.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: First rate, well built bracket
customer_reviews.text: This is a first rate product. I was hesitant that the hinge mechanism would compromise the stability of the installation, but I am happy to report the bracket is rock solid. Being able to move the TV away from the wall while you wire it then push it back flush to the wall make installation much easier. The bracket comes with clip-on guides for dressing the wires, making the final installation very tidy. I recommend this wall mount without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Works well and a good bang for its buck!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this is wall mount for my bedroom 55" led (Samsung). If you fallow the directions and use a level you will be quite pleased with the results. I'm able to bring it from flat against the wall to over hanging my dresser one handed and also adjust the tilt of the screen with relative ease. The best part is that the support arms have a plastic cover that not only looks good cosmetically but works as wire management to keep the unsightly rats nest of HDMIs and usb cables hidden.
customer_reviews.author: Chase & April

customer_reviews.title: Simple enough
customer_reviews.text: Installed very easily, folds pretty flat, and its easy to run the cables. The instructions are poor quality, but if you're thinking of doing this on your own you'll probably be just fine. Use 3/8" pilot holes for the wood lag screws. My 50" tv had a 200 x 200 bolt pattern, so that made it even easier to install. It allows you to adjust the sideways tilt (am I saying this right?) so that if you mount it slightly off level, you can fix it. Tighten the screws for the viewing angle before you pull the TV out as they're not completely tightened from the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Steven H

customer_reviews.title: Needed to buy shorter screws.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to mount a 32" TV above a treadmill. We needed a thin profile mount because we could not move the treadmill back any further without blocking a doorway. The actual mounting was easy but all together it took an hour from out of the box till it was on the wall. The only thing anyone might have to worry about is needing to use different screws to attach the mount to your TV. Our TV is also quite thin and the screws included were too long to properly fit the mount to our TV. I took the provided screws with me to Lowes and was able to find screws that were the appropriate length and the correct threading.
customer_reviews.author: Rose C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and strong build quality
customer_reviews.text: Received it on time, this was my first wall mount installation in my house, 1st* my tv: 46" Sony lcd tv weighs about 30 lbs, 2nd* tools: drill (no drill bits needed to pilot any holes) screwdriver, and stud finder, 3rd: wall: drywall to a stud, it was pretty easy straight forward installation instructions, had my tv mounted in 45 mins since I'm a rookie, my next tv mount might be faster..simple yet strong build quality.. And the price was perfect for my budget!!! I would definitely recommend this product. UPDATE: been almost 2 months since I mounted this, everything is still going strong, swivel still perfect!!:)
customer_reviews.author: Fotu

customer_reviews.title: Good mount!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very easy to install, positions the TV as close to the wall as any mount I've ever seen, multiple adjustment set screws allows for a solid installation in any TV position, very fair price for this well made mount. Cons: Finding a stud to install the mount on is a MUST. After installation the wall mount base plate and the TV's final position are not on the same center line. To actually center your TV on a specific spot the mount base plate must be attached approximately 3" left or right of the desired center line. Not a major issue but one that must be considered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: First off, don't put this thing on upside down. I nearly cried. Secondly, the bracket is held in place with large wood screws for stud walls (anchors for concrete). It will be necessary to drill pilot holes, but the screws can do the rest. I used a socket wrench to drive the screws into the wood - the screws have a hex head instead of a philips or slot. However, other that that - the install was shockingly easy. Mine is holding a 55" LED and works beautifully. It is easy to move the TV around the wall, and the hardware gives me confidence that everything will stay where it should.
customer_reviews.author: Review Master

customer_reviews.title: Works great for an excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as intended for a great price. Mounted to cinder-block wall using the existing bolts and mollys, but needed to buy my own masonry bit to drill the holes. Mounted backing plate to the TV without issue. Was able to mount a small TV on this without any additional help (because of the easy hanging feature) which was nice. The plastic cable covers on the arms are a little unforgiving for routing anything bigger than HDMI, but I was able to zip-tie a power-strip to the arm so that everything was contained behind the TV (no cable-box, just connected to a Chromecast).
customer_reviews.author: Todd Repp

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV mount!  I suggest NOT using factory hardware.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome TV mount! I suggest NOT using factory hardware. It was galvanized, plastic and looked of poor quality. We also decided against using Tapcons as our mount is outside, hung on a cinder-block wall. Used old school Lead anchors and stainless steel bolts. All together set me back $15 from Home depot. Worth every penny! The mount is perfect and a third of the price. Not wobbly or loose anywhere. Tilt holds a 32 inch samsung smart tv perfectly. I will be buying another for inside.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie G.

customer_reviews.title: Great bracket.
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best bracket you're going to get for the price. Installed with concrete anchors from home depot instead of the included ones as they wanted you to drill way too far into the wall than I wanted. I would recommend picking up some nice anchors from home depot for your wall instead of the included ones. Cord holders are a very nice feature and keep everything nice and need. Bracket feels very sturdy and holds my 50" TV fine. Have a friend help you install to so you can have someone making sure everything is level as its going into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great mount and fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to anything I would buy in the store locally, this is just as good and much, much cheaper. My only complaint is that they did not have enough variety in screw lengths. One screw was too short and the next length of screw was much too long. I ended up using about 8 washers on each long screw to make it all work. Luckily I had the washers on hand...otherwise, I probably would've just gotten the correct length of screw. Other than that, the mount works great and was very easy to assemble and mount. I have this item saved in case I need another one!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Solid, slim, sturdy, adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mount. I bought this for my brother for Christmas. We first bought a cheap $20 slim mount. The other mount was near impossible to install. This mount is much nicer. It is quite heavy and very secure. I love that it folds down so slim. Cable access is super easy with the articulation. They can turn the TV to watch from kitchen. 4 years ago I purchased a similar mount for my house for three times the price. Cable management is nice. It is adjustable in both tilt and rotation. The rotation was unclear in the advertising, but it is handy in case you are a couple degrees off on your leveling. Would recommend highly
customer_reviews.author: Crozier

customer_reviews.title: Great TV Wall Mount!
customer_reviews.text: This TV wall mount bracket is perfect for my needs. It allows the TV to be positioned close to the wall but it also allows for the TV to be swiveled and adjusted to give me a better viewing angle depending on where I'm sitting. It was easy to fasten to the wall and it worked well with my Samsung flat screen. The price was very reasonable and I'd definitely consider buying another one to mount another TV in a different room.
customer_reviews.author: tah

customer_reviews.title: My TV Hands Like a Picture
customer_reviews.text: Great device especially for the price! Very solidly built. The lower area of my home has real rustic siding over cement poured walls. Being very "handy" I predrilled the siding and then used a concrete bit and "Tapcon" 3 inch screws and the arm mounted in one half hour. I have a new Samsung Smart TV which mated up perfectly with the bracket. The only adjustment I had to make was 2 nuts at the base needed loosed slightly so the arm swung easily. The only negative are the directions are very sketchy but anyone who is somewhat mechanical can figure it out without directions at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hall

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, hardware didn't quite fit my tv, but easy to fix.
customer_reviews.text: This was incredibly easy to install, although I did need a second set of hands to help install it. Basically they held it up & I used the drill to secure it to the wall. And that was it. There was a TON of included hardware to fit most tv's however the bolts that fit my tv were too long. The kit does include 2 different standoffs to accommodate for this, but one was too long & one was too short. I ended cutting the ones that were too long by about 1/4". I have an Upstar 42" tv.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B. Weber

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me with this mount!? SO AMAZING and SO INEXPENSIVE. I will be buying a few more just to have around for future products and projects. 1: SO easy to mount (hopefully you have a ratchet set handy, cause you will need one these bolts are LONG) 2: STRONG! 3: It extends WAY the heck out from the wall and turns on a dime. 4: THIS DOES HAVE VERTICAL TILT which they don't advertise here at all. (HUGE added bonus) 5: Still sleek with some aesthetic plastic covers along the wall to make it look less clunky
customer_reviews.author: THEBOUNCEHOUSE

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It seems all the 1 star review just didn't do the proper research to see if the product would work with their tv. I verified the vesa size would work for my tv. After mounting it on the wall I was able to hang on it without any damage to occur to the mount or my wall. Keep in mind this mount is rated for 88lbs and I weight over 100. My 50 inch tv is able to hang all the way extended on my wall allowing me to see it from every point in my room. I can rest assure my tv is safely mount on my wall with this bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Storm

customer_reviews.title: This is one my best Amazon purchases
customer_reviews.text: This is one my best Amazon purchases. I have a 55' Vizio and this thing handles it with EASE. Love the vertical mounting system, you only need to find one stud. I had my doubts since it was such as great price, but it has been nothing short of amazing. I recommend this to everyone. I've moved with it and just reinstalled in my new house this week, still going strong. You HAVE to use a stud when hanging it, but that's advertised. We move our TV a lot, and have never had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: tlk4334

customer_reviews.title: Good Sturdy Mount
customer_reviews.text: This is the first articulated TV mount that I have installed, but it seems to be a very good product..Well built with quality components, and well packaged to avoid damage in shipping. Installed on a cinder block wall in our cabin on the ranch, used one bolt at top and one at the bottom with large washers and nuts on the back side (which is in the HVAC closet). Made very sturdy mount. Put up a 48" VIZIO, so did not need the extensions on the front of the bracket. Installation and adjustments were easy, once I determined the bolts would clear the duct work and water heater.
customer_reviews.author: Carlitos

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the purchase and the price.
customer_reviews.text: This TV wall mount was perfect for my 39" TV for my bedroom. The installation was easy, just a drill and a ratchet and what ever you need to find the stud in the wall. The mount attaches to a stud and has a nice swivel to fit a good 60 degree swing. The mount detaches the plate that attaches to the TV for easy installation, then reattaches back to the mount on the wall and secure it so it can't detach. I'm very happy with the purchase and the price.
customer_reviews.author: RayD

customer_reviews.title: Well Built & Solid
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built wall mount that was very easy to install and connect a 42" LG Flat Panel that only weights around 20 lbs when the mount is rated for a maximum of 88 lbs. The only thing that is an inconvenience is where the cables connect to the back of the TV. They can be difficult to get to due to both the positioning of the connections as well as the way the bracket mounts to the back of the TV. That is easily fixed by rearranging the H brackets before mounting the TV. Other than that it is a very nice and solid mount that I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: The Invision mount looks great and will probably stay on the wall through an ...
customer_reviews.text: This would get a 5 star review if it said it was meant for bigger televisions. This is a heavy duty mount that will keep your TV on the wall in the biggest of earthquakes. I however ordered it to mount a 32" Vizio to a mobile home wall and the fact that the mount weighed as much as the TV and came with 3.5" lags made me decide to order the Ematic universal mount instead. The Invision mount looks great and will probably stay on the wall through an F5 tornado so if you need a big screen (heavy) TV mount this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: exduffer

customer_reviews.title: If You're Worried About Your TV Size, Read This.
customer_reviews.text: This wall mount is everything you could want. Easy to install, sturdy, functions properly, and is affordable! It installs in a single stud, so you don't have to match it up with two of them. Even on one stud, this thing is ROCK SOLID. Certified for up to 88 pounds, so my 65 inch Samsung is no problem. Honestly, as long as your TV has a VESA standard of up to 400x400 and weighs less than 88 pounds, this thing will hold it. Don't need to listen to the 55 inch max in the description. I can't recommend this thing enough.
customer_reviews.author: Nick LaFazia

customer_reviews.title: Don't listen to bad reviews. This is great!
customer_reviews.text: I was at Walmart, and unhappy with their prices on TV mounts. I did a quick look on Amazon and decided on this one. I did see the negative reviews which complained about it articulating too much. It does articulate but that is what I like about it. If you don't want one that can move pretty much anywhere you wanted, do not buy this. I can sit anywhere in my living room and make the TV face me. We have a large TV and it has no problem holding the weight of it. It moves like butter. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M Henricks

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, inexpensive and easily installed.
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed too good (I.e., inexpensive) to be true. However it was sturdy and well constructed. Installation was easy and all necessary hardware was included. It was was easy to move the TV out from the wall and pivot it to one side to access the back and connect the cables. My only issue is that the bracket is fairly stiff to move and I worry about my inexpensive 40" HDTV flexing when I grab the edges to adjust its position. This isn't likely to be much of an issue since I won't be moving the TV often once everything is connected and the tilt adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Jouster

customer_reviews.title: I had to do a lot of adjustments and I ended up getting it pretty close to level
customer_reviews.text: You really can't beat it for the price. This thing is rock solid even when it is extended all the way out supporting a 40 lb TV. My only knock on it is that mine wasn't square. I installed the mounting bracket vertically level but the TV was not even close to level. I had to do a lot of adjustments and I ended up getting it pretty close to level. I have had experience with 2 other TV wall mounts and didn't have this issue but they cost more than twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a Great Wall mount. I used it to hand a 46" Sony flat screen on my living room and was very pleased with the results. Unlike other mounts, this one is has an incredibly thin profile. This allows the TV to sit very close to the wall but also extend out a couple feet if you need it. The mounting bolts are adequate if you are mounting to block or into studs. However, if you are mounting to a traditional drywall surface, I suggest buying some heavy duty drywall studs if the vertical mounting arm does not happen to line up with a wall stud.
customer_reviews.author: Ross G.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: This mount is everything I expected and then some for the price. I bought (2) of these mounts; (1)-For Samsung 40 inch LCD & (1) for Sylvania 25" LCD. The "X" designed mounting accommodated both TV's perfectly. Love the "slip-on" sleeves that hide your cables perfect. The 4 points of articulation allow me to move my TV's exactly where I want them to view from anywhere in the room. I will be purchasing (2) more for my parents TV's. amazing product
customer_reviews.author: Jack Dittman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy to Move
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mount holding up a 47 inch LG for a couple of months now, and I am pleased with my purchase. It allows you to move your TV against the wall, out from the wall, and allows you to tilt it left or right which is nice, because I can watch TV and see it clearly now when I'm cooking in the kitchen. It feels sturdy, but adjusting the screen to face the way you want is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: Low Cost, High Quality, Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wall mount for our living room flat screen TV. Works perfectly. Easy to install and adjust. I have purchased other brands of wall mounts in the past that were much more expensive. This one is just as good as those for a fraction of the price. The next time I buy another wall mount for another TV, I will buy another one of these. Low cost and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great sturdy wall mount
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wall mount my our 32 inch TV in our office. It worked so great that I ended up buying another one for ourin our bedroom. Family and friends always comment on how cool it is that it extends and retracts. It definitely feels sturdy which is a major plus when dealing with expensive equipment. It also provides some cabling help. FYI: It extends roughly 20 inches from the wall and when folded flat against the wall, the center of the TV ends up about 5 inches from the mounting bar.
customer_reviews.author: hiowatha

customer_reviews.title: An Awesome Mount: Great Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how sturdy this thing is! Mounts easily (I mounted to wood studs), but as other reviewers have pointed out, the TV will sit 5" off center from where you mount the base (due to the folding design). I ended up mounting it on a stud to the left of where we wanted the TV, and extended the arm as far to the right as we could to try to offset this. Not ideal, but it works in our apartment where we don't have room to re-center our furniture around the TV location. I'm very satisfied with the mount and would certainly recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzsax86

customer_reviews.title: Very strong mount but keeps a low profile.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wall mount because after reading tons of reviews, I got the feeling that the heavy duty ones were worth paying a bit more for. I had the Time Warner cable man put it up & attach my new TV. He agreed with me ....".get a mid priced unit when asking an arm to stick out & move around." Makes sense when you think about gravity in such a situation. This one is great and came with 3 different plates to attach the TV to. Each plate was for a different size TV. You end up with 2 extra plates. Would love to give my other 2 extras away.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny Max

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Mount lined up with Panasonic TV but covered the connection for power cord. Even provided spacers couldn't allow power cord to connect properly. Had to use both provided spacers with longer screws bought at big box. The extension arm is very stable. The mounting plate itself is a little flimsey. On the tilt feature there was a screw that was already stripped out and won't tighten, just spins. For that reason the tv stays in a tilted angle and can't be changed. OK because it is mounted higher and needed to be tilted anyways, but I would be upset if I didn't need it tilted. Overall a decent mount. I've purchases better mounts on amazon, yet more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Guiser

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably Priced & Very Functional
customer_reviews.text: Good strong mount which I used for a 40 " Vizio. Came with all the necessary parts for mounting almost any TV. It seems to be working fine and has a lot of position adjustments available. I would have given it 5 stars except for a little confusion with the instructions. If you can, install a wall electric/cable box behind the mount which would "finish the install" and eliminate the hanging wires. For the price it was a very good product and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: NC Golfer

customer_reviews.title: Great little mount for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little mount for the price. I've ordered 3 of them to mount various TV's. What's nice about it is that it mounts to just a single stud and the cantilever arm works really well. It folds tight against the wall, but then extends smoothly allowing you to position the monitor however you like. There are only a couple of negatives in my mind. First, the tilt setting can only be adjusted with a wrench, so changing the tilt is not too convenient. Second, the cable management covers are flimsy and don't work well if you have a lot of cables going to the TV. Overall, however, you can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I did a few days worth of research, this being the best for the money that also tilts. As it does require a small supplied wrench to adjust the tilt, that's no issue as I don't need to move it often, yet if I did it takes less than a minute. Installation was extremely straight forward so long you know where a stud is, however directions were a joke. The only part of it in English were the parts list, the actual instructions were in four other languages. It's super sturdy, doesn't flex and the mount is quite heavy itself. If you need the best priced quality tv wall mount, look no further!
customer_reviews.author: Crider

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: This articulating TV mount is great...Heavy Duty design and Great Quality...the mount articulates well in a 180 degress, come out from the wall about 20" or so and rotates firmly and stays were you put it...I have this in my workout room and the mount is rotated daily as I use it to cylce with on my bike trainer and then my wife rotates when she uses the threadmill. No issues and i don't foresee anything in the future and it does have a lifetime warranty. Fantastic buy....should cost 4 times what I paid. Bill D.
customer_reviews.author: wdodge45

customer_reviews.title: Watch your TV from anywhere in the room!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my 55" LED LG TV. I wanted something that would allow me to swing the TV around so that we could watch it from the dining room as well as all over the living room. Well with my 55" TV, I can nearly turn this thing a full 90 degrees to either side! It is also very sturdy, more than enough to handle the weight of my TV. I have assembled a few Flat screen mounting brackets, and I would say this one was about average difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: Cari Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mount
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hang a 24" TV on the wall so it could be viewed from the treadmill or our bed. The nice thing about this mount is that the TV is mounted to a separate bracket PRIOR to attaching it to the bracket mounted on the wall which made the process easy. The bracket has plenty of options to position the TV making it extremely versatile. Once the bracket is attached to the TV it is just a matter of securing it to the wall mount with a clip - very nice. I highly recommend this bracket for a small TV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great articulating TV wall mount and even better price
customer_reviews.text: Great flat panel tv wall mount. For our vacation home, I purchased 4 to hang two 32", one 40" and one 48" tv. The price was worth the gamble and when I received them I was mad that I spent 3+X the $ amount on two from a national big box for my primary home. I'm sure the manufacturer will soon figure out there pricing mistake and raise the price. If your in the market for an articulating tv wall hanger do it now before prices rise. Well worth the money and easy to install but best application is to a stud.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Most Excellent Tv Mount!
customer_reviews.text: Best TV mount I have ever seen. The instructions are very vauge and you are left figuring out everything on your own (as the pictures are not very detailed) but once I got it up, you couldn't ask for anything better. There are plenty of wall anchoring options ( I ran three down the middle into the center of the stud and I can essentially hang on it). The full range of motion is excellent, the cord management behind is great (running 5 cords through it) and the extended arm comes out nearly 2 feet, making a smaller TV feel bigger in the room.
customer_reviews.author: D. Foulke

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice and Sturdy Wall Mount
customer_reviews.text: Very solid wall mount. It came with everything I needed. Including the larger 400mm attachment adapters. I mounted a 50" Samsung LED. Nice adjustment capability, which I needed when I drilled the wall mounting holes slightly off from vertical. I needed lots of reach. And the arm definitely gives me plenty. I did not need the arm to fold up but it is clearly very versatile and will hug the wall pretty well if needed. And all at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Matt V

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking, you found it.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this was amazing. I think I've used this for at least 7 years with no problems. And it's affordable?! Whaaaaa?!?!? I'd say this thing can hold up a lot more than it says. The TV that was on it forever is probably 50lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Josh B.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised with quality - great product.
customer_reviews.text: I spent about $80 on one of these from Costco. I needed two more, decided to give these a try and I was very pleasantly surprised. I cannot tell the difference. They work perfectly. I bought two of these and I'm very happy with them. Easy to install - just make sure it's level so your TV isn't cockeyed. This is a huge money saver. I could have bought three of these for what I paid for one at Costco. The feel of these is solid. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Plain Truth

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I'm still trying to figure out how this is made so well for so little money. I'm super impressed with the build quality. Yes, the instructions aren't super detailed, but if you're at all handy, you'll figure it out. Plenty of screw sizes included for various TV's. If in doubt, use a longer screw with the provided spacers. Pivot points are tight/solid, so no wobble but still easy to move. I used it to mount a 48 inch Samsung LED display.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: well built and installed easily (because I didn't do it
customer_reviews.text: Solid as a rock, well built and installed easily (because I didn't do it! my wife and daughter did... and there was no cursing or obvious signs of frustration). Holding a 40" Sony Bravia without breaking a sweat. So far we're loving the maneuverability and adjustments that can be made to the bracket. Who knew you could get such a great piece of equipment at less than a 1/2 or more what you pay for some of the other brands. The cable management was a bit tight, but other than that, nothing but good things to say about this unit. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Peter A. Benway

customer_reviews.title: Swivel festure is best part
customer_reviews.text: The product is heavy duty, maybe a little over kill for a 40" TV. Bolts were huge 9/16? Very heavy bracket. I supposed that's good, but if this was made of a lighter metal , it'd be perfectly fine for a 40" TV. Either way, this is a great product. I like that it can extend out and swivel, great for game day! It's also really good for odd shaped rooms, it allows TV to swivel in the direction if your gathering. I have an antique home store I only had one wall I could use for a TV for a really large room, the pull out and swivel features are perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Zunino

customer_reviews.title: Simple reliable mount, great fit & finish!
customer_reviews.text: Looks similar to a model sold at Home Depot. That is where the similarity ends. The product has great tolerances and the hardware included is very good quality. As a pro A/V company owner I have seen virtually every mount out there. This one is easy to install, has good leveling adjustments and the motion of all the extensions, tilts and rotations is very smooth - even though I hung a tv close to the maximum suggested weight. I am happy, my clients are happy. The price is great, quality is better than most.
customer_reviews.author: 1fstfreride

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy wanted $150 for a comparable mount
customer_reviews.text: When I bought my TV, Best Buy wanted $150 for a comparable mount. I knew I could beat that on Amazon, what I didn't know was that I could beat it by that much! Great mount, I have nothing negative to say about it. Never once did I think I got anything less than I would have got paying $150 for a similar mount from Best Buy. I have two of these: one holding a 55" on a flat wall and one holding a 40" in a corner. Worked out really well as a corner mount. Heavy duty, easy to install. Incredible value.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Riley

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for our 46" HDTV. Seems strong and durable. It partially blocked some connection ports on my Emerson TV that I had to be crafty in getting wires to them, but I wouldn't expect a universal mount to fit every tv perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bigrig61

customer_reviews.title: I am not really meaning so good or bad but it's woth satisfies its quality
customer_reviews.text: I was worring when I wasen't able to assamble and mount it on the wall and my TV on it. But was a simple. To be honest I have been purchasing a lots of stubs from Amazon, have never left a product review. This time I can't wait because of this product quality and its worth. I do recommand this product to people. It is durable and reliable, worthing a less. I understand human wants are unlimited, I do expect the product satisfies 90% of your want. I am not really meaning so good or bad but it's woth satisfies its quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tek Sarma

customer_reviews.title: Trust This Product
customer_reviews.text: We read other reviews on Amazon--as we always do--but especially for this product. Somehow we questioned the quality because of the very reasonable price, but we are very pleased with this wall mount bracket. It is what is says it is: durable, strong, and well-designed. Our Vizio fit the pre-drilled holes without any wiggle, wobble, or additional equipment. We are delighted to have tried this product and would order another. Sadly, Amazon now shows there are no more available at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Coach Connye

customer_reviews.title: Great Mount With All You Need to Mount Your TV to The Wall
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount and easy to attach your tv to a wall using one of the wall studs with included lag bolts. This very complete kit supplies everything you need to mount your tv to the wall. It is very sturdy and will fold flat to the wall. The mount also will tilt tv 10° down for higher wall mounting allowing for easy viewing. Pros Very sturdy Easy to mount Includes needed hardware Great Price Cons Really can't find any! Great mount, highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Invision® TV Wall Mount Bracket
customer_reviews.text: This mount was used to hold a smaller 32 inch vizio display. It went on without a hitch. I only needed to use the included three lag bolts. The display had the other mount bolts required. It feels very sturdy. Be mindful when snaking the cables around, they tended to get pinched when the mount is pressed flat against the wall. I would buy this again if I had to put another tv in another room.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! Great price, even better product!
customer_reviews.text: We've used this for over a year now and have moved from our old house where we originally installed it. The two times we've installed have both been simple to remove and simple to install. We love being able to bring the tv out and swivel it around! We're so glad we took the jump and used this mount versus others at 3x the price. Highly recommend Invision wall mount.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne-K

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Works great and for the price you can't beat it. My only concern with the product is when I used the bolts that came with it, every time I turned the socket wrench I could hear the wood splitting in the stud I was securing it to. I'm not sure if the bolts were too big or if maybe I was just off center. If I were to install it next time I would just use wood screws.
customer_reviews.author: Travis F.

customer_reviews.title: After two years still standing
customer_reviews.text: This has been an excellent wall. Mount especially for the price. I was hesitant to buy a low cost mount since major retailers have them for over 75 dollars. For a fraction of that I got great quality. I've owned this for two years and so far so good, tv can be viewed from anywhere in the living room. Would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Fabiola

customer_reviews.title: This mount is sturdy and does the job
customer_reviews.text: This mount is sturdy and does the job. Used it for our new 55" TV that weighs about 34lbs. It wasn't too hard to figure out the instructions, we have several similar mount that we installed so we had experience with how it's supposed to be done. The instructions sent with the mount are picture only. I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: L.A

customer_reviews.title: The best swivel mount I've ever seen for the price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 48" perfectly. The price point is ridiculously low, which deterred me initially, since I was going to put a really expensive TV on it, but after reading some reviews, I was convinced to try it out. 100% do not regret this decision. This mount is AWESOME. You can adjust the angle, the tilt, and the direction. AWESOME product, I recommend it to all of my friends looking to mount TVs in the fashion that I have.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Our 40" plasma weighs a good 45-50 pounds so personally
customer_reviews.text: Very solid, well constructed unit. Very limited instruction set. Also, when folded, your TV will not be centered on the wall if say you are positioning it over a fire place as we did. You have to offset the mount by approximately 4" thus your odds of hitting a stud are slim to none. Our 40" plasma weighs a good 45-50 pounds so personally, I wouldn't trust using the heavy duty dry wall anchors, that come with it. Otherwise, an excellent value and very solidly constructed.
customer_reviews.author: JeffO

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Well Built, Heavy Duty, Easy Install Mount
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product. Installation instructions are a bit sparse but if you sit with the few parts there are for a few minutes you don't really need them. Just take time to plan the whole installation and make sure everything is secure. I would like to see it be able to be raised and lowered, but you just can't beat the price for such a well built, heavy duty mount.
customer_reviews.author: Aoxoa

customer_reviews.title: Terrific mount for a terrific deal!
customer_reviews.text: This mount is awesome. It moves in almost every direction you want it to. It has very strong, metal constructed, arms that are very high quality. The metal bar holding it to the wall is very sturdy, and ensures that your TV will stay up on the wall. I do not have a heavy television, I have a cheap 32" TV. But I do know that this mount could easily hold up a 60 inch. And something else that is great about this, IT HAS A 25 YEAR WARRANTY. I would definitely recommend this mount to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Teagan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great mount, sturdy and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: This mount works exactly as described. It was easy to install, holds my TV perfectly and makes my room look much nicer. The cable management feature is great, keeps the unsightly cords out of the way. I was a little nervous about putting giant holes in my wall but if you take your time to find a stud and measure correctly, you should not have any issues. I would just make sure you don't mount this somewhere then decide to rearrange because your studs may eventually look like Swiss cheese and lose structural integrity.
customer_reviews.author: Serge

customer_reviews.title: fantastic and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap, sturdy, relatively attractive, easy to assemble and only needs to be mounted on one stud, really couldn't ask for anything more. It was a little confusing picking the proper hardware to use TV, but the company can't really be faulted for making it possible to use the mount with as many different TVs as possible! I've had a 50" TV mounted and generally keep it extended as far left as possible to keep the TV centered in front of my bed despite being in front of a closet, and it's perfectly stable.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bracket for the price. No question.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bracket for the price. No question. Super sturdy, hanging a 46" LCD TV. 4 stars since the forward tilting angular is small. I do think they could have gotten an extra 5 degrees out of it, which would have been better for my configuration. There are even plastic sleeves on the metal arms that I used to channel the power cable and hdmi cable. FWP.
customer_reviews.author: C. Whitchurch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bracket!
customer_reviews.text: This bracket is awesome! Very well made. Love the wire management and the versatility of the mounting holes for different TV's. I bolted it with the included 3 lag bolts to a stud and I think I could do pull ups on this thing. When you move the position of the TV it is very smooth and still feels sturdy. If I need another one, I'm buying this one again!
customer_reviews.author: S. Hackenburg

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy adaptable mount. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a tall TV stand before realizing that I could mount a TV as high or short as I wanted. A TV mount is much cheaper than a TV stand so I couldn't be more excited. This mount was excatly what I was looking for. Very adaptable for different sizes. Installation was easy by finding a stud and three bolts. Only took about half an hour total. Used for a 32" TV and could easily hold something much larger.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: We were amazed! This type of articulating mount used to be ...
customer_reviews.text: We were amazed! This type of articulating mount used to be so expensive. For $40 a piece we bought 3. I couldn't be happier! ! Ever body that comes in to the house raves about them. It sure is nice being able to pull the tv out from the wall,spin it to see it in the dining room and out to front windows. Makes watching the Chiefs and Royals that much nicer! Go Royals.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: I have a panasonic with the power cord pretty much off centered at the bottom on the back
customer_reviews.text: I have a panasonic with the power cord pretty much off centered at the bottom on the back. The bracket wouldn't go over it, but they sent spacers to use that fixed the problem. It was super easy to install and very sturdy for my 50 inch. The instructions are horrible but we didn't go by them because we pretty much have common sense. We mounted the wall mount, then the tv one to the back of the tv, then hung it and put the other two bolts behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: BEST MOUNT EVER
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV mount. The price is insane ($25), when in store these mounts are over $100 for one that only supports half the weight. These support up to 88 lbs and only $25? Yes, please! I bought one for my upstairs a while back, but I just bought another one for my workout room to hang an old TV that wasn't being used, and once again it is incredibly sturdy and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: ChazerC

customer_reviews.title: Great mount for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality mount that has different parts to use depending on the configuration on the back of your TV. Parts are heavy duty steel and the mount is very solid. Great mount for the money. Is comparable to mounts I've paid two or three times the price of this one. Only reason I'm not giving it five stars is that the drawings in the non verbal instructions were not very clear and it took me a while to figure out which parts to use and which were unneeded for my tv.
customer_reviews.author: Cactus

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, got the cords all in place and it holds up my 55" Plasma over the fire place. Really like the feature of it pulling out away from the wall and it can move left to right. I can angle it so I can watch from the kitchen while cooking then when I'm in the living room angle it back against the wall. To me, this item does the job. No problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Shipping arrived before date specified and easy to install with exception that I had to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 mounts for 28" & 50" TV's. Shipping arrived before date specified and easy to install with exception that I had to get longer screws for 28" when using small spacers. Enclosed screws would not let me attach to threads. Other than that it gives me versatility I have been looking for in TV mounts for a long time and at a very good price!
customer_reviews.author: AK Tech

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mount!
customer_reviews.text: Made mounting my tv very easy! The thin back bracket allowed me to use the same stud. All the needed screws/ bolts are included. The finished mount is rock solid. I was able to put all of my weight on it without any bending or wavering whatsoever. I mounted my samsung 50" LCD and with the almost 20" extension arm it works perfect for my bedroom. I couldn't be happier! Make sure you measure the back of your TV to make sure the bolt holes aren't too far apart....
customer_reviews.author: Philip R

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT. had it holding a 40" in the ...
customer_reviews.text: so.. about this thing. I LOVE IT. had it holding a 40" in the guest bedroom and realized how much my living room was missing out with just a tilting mount. swapped them and the rest is history. currently holding my 55" in living room and not a day goes by where guests don't compliment the 180 movement and mention it must have cost a fortune (best buy wanted $145!!). five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tahj

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Really great wall mount, especially for the price. I had zero experience mounting TVs. I purchased this and the installation was very easy. The hardest part is just finding the stud in the wall. I mounted a 50" TV on it and it's very stable and sturdy. I think my TV is about 30 lbs, and the capacity for this wall mount is 80 or so (I can't remember exactly). It's very slim and well-designed and the tilt is easy to set. I will purchase this again if I get another TV for a different room.
customer_reviews.author: Blake T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, solidly-built, asthetically pleasing and featureful mount with great freedom of movement
customer_reviews.text: Really great mount, TV can go flat against the fall, or rotate left and right as well as tilt down a few degrees. We have ours on the edge of a wall that divides two rooms, allowing us to swivel the TV into either room. It's freedom of movement is just incredible, and it moves very easily yet has a very sturdy feel. It appears to have been really well made. There are various plastic pieces that sit along the mount that allow cables to be ran under them, to the base of the mount, keeping things neat and aesthetic.
customer_reviews.author: Hiavatch

customer_reviews.title: Have you priced these at Best Buy?
customer_reviews.text: This TV mount was (relatively) easy to install and articulates nicely. My daughter's 40" flat-screen had no issue with weight or positioning. It gets the job done. I said 'relatively' easy to install because you have to drill a hole deep into the wall studs to support the leveraged weight. This is simple physics, not a design issue. Handyman skills, a drill, and a stud-finder make mounting a routine task. If you're afraid of spiders or drywall dust, get help.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. WatersTop Contributor: Archery

customer_reviews.title: Don't mess up order get the right one
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice HEAVY DUTY design , but check out the tv mounting on the TV itself!!!! this one covered the video and the audio , as well as a HDMI plugin.. but on a lightweight TV the 42" led, the wing I needed to saw out was minor.. You may need some shorter lag bolts as the ones provided are longer than studs in the wall... Any tv more than 30 lbs. you may want the longer bolts. all in all this is Heavy Duty enough for an old style 32" @ 120lbs :)
customer_reviews.author: Stretch

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product!!!
customer_reviews.text: After having this wall mount for several months I can truly say this is a great value for the price that you pay for this. Putting together was easy and quick. Took around 20 minutes from pulling out the box to putting on my wall. Once I positioned the tv how I wanted it and tightend the bolts it was never to beworried about again. Came with several screws to accommodate any tv for mounting. Quality is incredible and is a very solid tv mount. Even when I move the tv to adust my view angle it is never a hassle and very smooth transition. Will definately buy again when the time arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... now that it's up - it seems to work great. The hardest part was agreeing on how high ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a 2-man job installing our 55" to the mount and now that it's up - it seems to work great. The hardest part was agreeing on how high to hang it. It comes away from the wall and turns for viewing in a different room much farther than I thought it would. We looked at a similar mount at BB for $250, so I'm happy I looked on Amazon and found this item. What a savings and it arrived a day earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: CV

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Well made and holds my led 42" Samsung tv just fine. Love the price and hope they keep it there because it is worth more but not everyone wants to pay up the nose. Infact when I took it out the box I loved the weight. The plastic wire holder is not worth having in truth if they went with a silicone or latex based material it would hold the wires better and move with the device. Other then that I love it and not only get an other one but I have told every one that has seen it or was looking to get a wall mount.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wall mount
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wall mount for a 40 inch Vizio tv. It was easy to install and is very sturdy. I love that I can position the tv just about anywhere I want with this mount, I can pull it quite far to either side, pull it far out from the wall, tilt it, you name it. Very convenient for a room I'm which adjusting the angle of the screen is important. Also can't beat the price. I highly recommend this wall mount.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome heavy duty stand for our 47" LCD TV!
customer_reviews.text: We hung our older 47" LCD TV with this mount and it has held up for the past 6 months. I was surprised with how sturdy the stand really is. It's also heavy duty metal. The back plate is a cheap plastic, but everything else is very well made. I love that I can turn my tv at different angles to include tilting it up and down slightly. I highly recommend this stand!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun L.

customer_reviews.title: great mount with small footprint but awkward movement
customer_reviews.text: The footprint on the wall of this mount is small. It fit great on the wall in my bar and allowed the stone to cover most of the wall. It is holding a 46" Samsung TV without any issue. I used the extension plate to get the largest vesa mount it was capable of. The only downside is that the mount does not move in and out evenly. It has to move a bit to the right or left and thus I can't really move it out as the space between the cabinets is tight. I like it except for that fact, even though it is pretty limiting.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Very good wall mount, it is strdy and has very well thought out adjustments to allow you to level your tv, and installation wasn't that bad since I used an impact driver to drive the lag bolts into a stud in the wall. I will say however, if you don't own at least a drill and a ratchet wrench, I would recommend going and getting one before attempting to mount this since the tools it came with are of the extremely flimsy stamped steel sort.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn S.

customer_reviews.title: Great value product
customer_reviews.text: I don't know a lot about these things but just couldn't understand why we had been paying so much money for wall mounts for tvs. So I checked amazon and found this reasonably priced item. Works great, sturdy, secure and best of all a great price. Arrived on time and we are very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: FashionBizarre

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty mount, easy to install and works great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy mount. It is very heavy, so make certain you know where the studs are in your wall and drill directly into those. I bought 2 of these to put on the trailer I use for tailgating and they work great. Easy installation with all parts to fit multiple VESA sizes included. The plastic piece that covers the place where it attaches to your wall is a little flimsy, but it does the job intended (but this is why I didn't give it 5 stars. I would definitely buy from this company again as the price is a fraction of what you would pay in a store.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Lewis MD

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We installed this on a brick wall on our outdoor patio for a 55" TV. It feels a little flimsy when fully extended but that is because of the range of motion. We wanted something that would hold the tv close to the wall, but give us the flexiblity to extend it out and rotate if needed. Our Outdoor TV cover also fits snuggly over the back to protect from the elements. Perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.author: softballmom

customer_reviews.title: I love that I can swing it out so I can ...
customer_reviews.text: So, all 5'3" and 110 lbs of me was able to install this baby ALONE. Honestly didn't think I'd be able to, but it's so well designed. The hardest part for me was drilling straight holes!! But it's forgiving enough that it didn't really matter. I love that I can swing it out so I can see the TV if I'm in the kitchen, but it goes really close to the wall when I'm in the room. The cable guy liked the swing out feature too :)
customer_reviews.author: S. Gilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Completely satisfied! I am amazed at the quality of this product for the price... It was very well packaged and came complete with everything you need to include some extra screw, etc. if needed. I mounted a 32in Insignia Smart TV and I had no issues at all, it took me about 20 minutes total. This mount can handle a much heavier TV than the one I have for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Loving the range of motion!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wall mount! It is super sturdy and makes the picture look so much better than sitting on an entertainment shelf! The flexibility and range of motion are out of this world. I would definitely buy this product again in the future if it were available to meet my needs. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Sharla Wolters

customer_reviews.title: BEST MOUNT I'VE EVER HAD!
customer_reviews.text: This TV mount costs FAR less than similar mounts found at Best Buy/Lowes/Home depot and is about the same quality. Installation was very simple. I'm using this for a 48" samsung smart tv and love all the tilt/turn features this has to offer! In fact I bought a second one for a TV we just recently ordered. HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS MOUNT TO ANYONE LOOKING TO HANG THEIR TV!!
customer_reviews.author: Rambo

product_meta.title: Invision TV Wall Mount Bracket with Tilt and Swivel 20 Inch Articulating Arm/Ultra Slim 1.8-Inch Wall Profile for Most 26-55 Inch LED/LCD/Plasma/4K/3D & Curved Screens (A2/HDTV-L)
product_meta.description: Invision TV brackets are leading the market in the home entertainment equipment industry due to our constant innovations and overwhelming commitment to quality. Unlike other cantilever TV brackets in this area which in most circumstances only achieve a closed depth distance of 7” from the wall, Our product is practical and unique in this Department folding away neatly to an impressive 46mm Well under 2”. Engineered to be compatible with most makes and models of TVs with VESA mounting holes: 100mm x 100mm (3.9” x 3.9”), 100mm [vertical] x 200mm [horizontal] (3.9” x 7.9”), 200mm x 200mm (7.9” x 7.9”), 200mm[v] x 300mm[h] (7.9” x 11.8”), 250mm[v] x 400mm[h] (9.8” x 15.8”), 200mm[v] x 400mm[h] (7.9”; x 15.8”), 300mm x 300mm (11.8” x 11.8”), 300mm[v] x 400mm[h] (11.8” x 15.8”) & 400mm x 400mm (15.8” x 15.8”) with M4 M5 M6 or M8 fixing bolts this easy to install bracket comes with all the necessary hardware and installation guide included. Compared to other large back-plated brackets which impinge on the home entertainment environment Our back plate is narrow yet strong and can be fitted to wood brick or concrete, each arm has integrated cable management to give better functionality, tidiness and a higher quality finish. Our Hinge mechanism used to operate the tilting feature is a one-touch tool less operation, advancing from the widely used, dated and impractical nuts and bolts arrangement which require much manual adjustment. The cantilever arm reaches an impressive 500mm/19.7” extension and manoeuvre left and right over 180⁰ providing the much needed versatility to optimize your viewing experience. Idea for kitchens bedrooms and other home entertainment areas We welcome you to discover why invision TV brackets are the number one brand For TV wall brackets and home entertainment equipment. The H400 adapter plates that come with this bracket can fit either horizontally or vertically to avoid covering any input/output ports
feature_bullets: Compatible TV Mounting Holes 100mm x 100mm to 400mm x 400mm (3.9” x 3.9” to 15.8” x 15.8”) See description for more details
Unprecedented ultra slim wall distance 46mm/1.8 inches maximum arm extension 500mm/19.7”
Built to the highest specification CE certified product 88lbs/40kg maximum TV load capacity
Tool free tilting action technology +10° tilt down and -2° tilt up & 180° rotation adjustment
25 year warranty on all parts covered by our Invision Product Warranty Guarantee

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars12,628 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
